Description: Ostracon, section (two fragments joined) of the upper-body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is lightly spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394226) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394226)
